tweet.text: PUBLIC MEETING Dec. 5, 2022 at 10am ET Join us for the open session of the Advisory Committee on Historical Diplomatic Documentation (#HAC). To register for this free online event, please send an email to FortJL@state.gov https://t.co/B6ULzxzWLL
